description:
Kurtz takes a peek inside Narden`s room, which is so fancy that it kills the entire show animation budget! How can you have sexy armor if you can`t afford to draw anything but scribbles?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Armor! Armor! Armor! A Chest Full of Armor!
Bougu! Bougu! Bougu! Muneippai no Ai o
防具! 防具! 防具! 胸いっぱいの愛を
